nodes.text: The Machinist Droid MC-12 was a model of labour droid produced by the Okara Droid Company. A number of MC-12 droids worked in one section of the Okara Droid Factory on the planet Balmorra.

The Machinist Droid MC-12 appears a type of enemy in the Bounty Hunter class mission "Chaos at the Droid Factory" in the 2011 BioWare massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
